attributes.long-description:
Arland Atelier Trilogy Plus is a complete set of Atelier Arland series.

This Trilogy includes,
-Atelier Rorona Plus: The Alchemist of Arland
-Atelier Totori Plus: The Adventurer of Arland
-Atelier Meruru Plus: The Apprentice of Arland

Explore the world of Arland with enchanting characters and see the whole story of these Archemists.

Note: Please check to make sure you have enough hard drive space (at least 10GB) before downloading this game.

Atelier Rorona Plus
-1 Player
-Minimum Save Size 2,048KB
-Network Features -Atelier Rorona Plus only
-Touchscreen
-Rear Touch Pad
-Dual Analog Sticks
-Motion Sensor
-Cross-platform play PS3(TM) -Atelier Rorona Plus only

Atelier Meruru Plus
-1 Player
-Minimum Save Size 1,000KB
-Touchscreen
-Rear Touch Pad
-Dual Analog Sticks
-Motion Sensor

Atelier Totori Plus
-1 Player
-Minimum Save Size 1,000KB
-Touchscreen
-Rear Touch Pad
-Dual Analog Sticks
-Motion Sensor

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
